item.title: Bill Burr Signs First-Look Deal With Fox Entertainment via His North Hill Productions
item.description: Bill Burr has signed a first-look deal with Fox Entertainment Studios via his banner North Hill Productions. Through the partnership, Burr and his producing partner, North Hill co-founder Mike Bertoli
